Class

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Class.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlaCarteItem, Promotion

    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Item parent class for AlaCarteItem and Promotion It implements serializable to allow us to serialize and deserialize to a file
    Since:
    2019/04/01
    Version:
    9.0
    Author:
    Yeo Kok Leong Desmond
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
